definition: a liturgical headdress worn by bishops on formal occasions, fit together in a miter joint
details:
noun
- a liturgical headdress worn by bishops on formal occasions
= synonyms: mitre
- the surface of a beveled end of a piece where a miter joint is made
= example: the surface of a beveled end of a piece where a miter joint is made
= synonyms: mitre
- joint that forms a corner
= synonyms: mitre, miter joint, mitre joint
verb
- fit together in a miter joint
- bevel the edges of, to make a miter joint
- confer a miter on (a bishop)
